name: arc-mcp
description: Playwright-style semantic browser automation for Arc browser - control with semantic locators (role, label, text)
author: Andrew Gazelka

scripts.build: npm run build -w @arc-mcp/applescript && npm run build -w @arc-mcp/browser && npm run build -w arc-mcp-server
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w @arc-mcp/applescript && npm run typecheck -w @arc-mcp/browser && npm run typecheck -w arc-mcp-server
scripts.pack: npm run build && cd packages/server && npx @anthropic-ai/mcpb pack
scripts.ci: npm run typecheck && npm run build
